hero.title: DSynapse
hero.subtitle: DeFi platform and tokenomics model for decentralized AI using Ethereum and IPFS

about.title: What is DSynapse?
about.research_text: Our research aims to create a DeFi and tokenomics model for decentralized AI using Ethereum and IPFS, with token issuance following an ultrasound money model that balances minting and burning for each use case.
about.technology_text: We use IPFS for decentralized data storage and Ethereum for our smart contract implementation, creating a fully decentralized ecosystem for AI model training and usage.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics Model
tokenomics.issuance_text: Issuance of tokens through voting in the DAO to verify intellectual property and open-source training datasets.
tokenomics.burning_text: Burning of tokens to rate the most consumed datasets and most used LMSs, increasing their rating and incentivizing issuance with an ultrasound approach.
tokenomics.rewards_text: Rewards for intellectual property datasets that have donated ownership to public goods, encouraging contribution to the ecosystem.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.step1_text: Content creators and data owners contribute datasets for AI model training and verify their intellectual property through the DAO.
how_it_works.step2_text: The DAO validates the quality and originality of the data through a voting process, issuing tokens as rewards for valuable contributions.
how_it_works.step3_text: Users consume AI data and services, burning tokens in the process, which increases the rating of the most used datasets and creates a sustainable economic cycle.
